projects.title: ARAB UNION PLATFORM
projects.description: Full-stack web platform for the Arab Union of Small Enterprises featuring real-time messaging, virtual meeting management, personalized recommendation system, and intelligent RAG-architecture chatbot with Supabase database.

projects.title: WORKER MANAGEMENT PLATFORM
projects.description: Comprehensive employee management system with real-time chat, interactive analytics dashboard, performance tracking, and real-time screen sharing for activity monitoring using Supabase database.

projects.title: ADVANCED MESSAGING APP
projects.description: Real-time communication application built from scratch with MERN stack, featuring WebRTC video calls, video sharing, private secure rooms, and responsive modern UI.

projects.title: HOTEL RESERVATION SYSTEM
projects.description: Web application for managing hotel and coffee table reservations efficiently, delivering seamless user experience with dynamic UI and reliable backend system.

projects.title: CMR WEBSITE REDESIGN
projects.description: Complete UI/UX redesign of CMR Marktforschung Mannheim website, implementing modern responsive design with Next.js for improved navigation and user experience.

projects.title: AI CHATBOT
projects.description: Intelligent conversational AI chatbot built with advanced natural language processing capabilities, featuring context-aware responses, conversation memory, and seamless integration with Gemini API for enhanced user interactions.
